item.itunes:author: Running in Circles
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 01
item.itunes:summary:
Come and hang out with Mike, Todd, Ryan, and Kenny as we discuss: Snoop Dogg, Affordable Space Adventures, Bloodborne, Heroes of the Storm, League of Legends, Axiom Verge, AC China, Dragon Age: Inqusition, and Ori and The Blind Forest.]]</itunes:summary>
